ng   - Palliative Care,GHR,familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
What is (are) Muckle-Wells syndrome ?,"Muckle-Wells syndrome is a disorder characterized by periodic episodes of skin rash, fever, and joint pain. Progressive hearing loss and kidney damage also occur in this disorder.  People with Muckle-Wells syndrome have recurrent ""flare-ups"" that begin during infancy or early childhood. These episodes may appear to arise spontaneously or be triggered by cold, heat, fatigue, or other stresses.
